resources.string: Broiled Salmon with Herb Mustard Glaze

Adding almond butter to your oatmeal lends a rich and nutty flavor that is especially delicious with a splash of almond milk. Spread over chia seeds to add a subtle crunch and an Omega-3 boost while the raspberries bring a burst of flavor and color.
Cook zucchini on the grill or in a grill pan until tender and layer it with raw peppers, spinach, store-bought hummus and herbs for a nutrient-packed, packable lunch
The salmon filets were so moist with the mustard glaze, this made for an elegant valentines day dinner.
Drizzle spinach-packed turkey meatballs in a creamy provolone cheese sauce for a delectable update on meatball night that is ready to go in 30 minutes.

Creamy avocado is a perfect topping for any simple grain dish, and oatmeal is no exception. Combine it with juicy cherry tomatoes, tamari, flax oil, and a scattering of parsley. Sesame seeds gives a great boost of protein, plus a nice crunchy texture.

This savory loaf recipe in the Alsace region of France is wonderfully moist, and because of the density of the veggie mixture, it does not rise too much. So be sure to pour all of the batter into the pan. You can add or substitute other veggies of your choice.
Tastes very similar to ones served in chain restaurants in our area. This one uses refrigerated Alfredo sauce as its base to give it a wonderful creamy texture.
